mapper.insert: insert into forums(user_id, title, content, create_time, update_time) values (#{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: select user_id, title, content, like_count, comment_count, state, create_time from forums where forum_id = #{forumId} and state = 'Readable'

select u.user_id, u.username, u.avatar, f.forum_id, f.title, f.content, f.like_count, f.comment_count, f.create_time from forums f inner join users u on u.user_id = f.user_id where f.state = 'Readable' order by f.create_time desc limit #{offset}, #{size}
mapper.insert: insert into forum_likes(forum_id, user_id, create_time) values (#{forumId}, #{userId}, #{createTime})
mapper.delete: delete from forum_likes where forum_id = #{forumId} and user_id = #{userId}
